languages.text: {n}Проходит минута, другая. Гости нервно ерзают. Но лишь тишина служит вам ответом — загадочный наследник так и не подает голоса.{/n}
{n}A minute passes, then another. The guests fidget nervously. But your words are met with nothing but silence — the mysterious heir still hasn't revealed themselves.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Проходит минута, другая. Гости нервно ерзают. Но лишь тишина служит вам ответом — загадочный наследник так и не подает голоса.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A minute passes, then another. The guests are fidgeting nervously. But your words are met with nothing but silence — the mysterious heir still hasn't revealed their presence.{/n}
{n}A minute passes, then another. The guests are fidgeting nervously. But your words are met with nothing but silence — the mysterious heir still hasn't revealed their presence.{/n}
{n}A minute passes, then another. The guests fidget nervously. But your words are met with nothing but silence — the mysterious heir still hasn't revealed themselves.{/n}
{n}A minute passes, then another. The guests fidget nervously. But your words are met with nothing but silence — the mysterious heir still hasn't revealed themselves.{/n}
{n}A minute passes, then another. The guests fidget nervously. But your words are met with nothing but silence — the mysterious heir still hasn't revealed themselves.{/n}

languages.text: {n}一分钟过去了，又一分钟过去了。紧张的宾客们坐立不安，但你的话只得到了沉默的回应。那位神秘的继承人依然没有现身。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A minute passes, then another. The guests fidget nervously. But your words are met with nothing but silence — the mysterious heir still hasn't revealed themselves.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}一分钟过去了，又一分钟过去了。紧张的宾客们坐立不安，但你的话只得到了沉默的回应。那位神秘的继承人依然没有现身。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pasa un minuto. Después otro. Los asistentes juguetean, nerviosos. Sin embargo, tus palabras solo reciben el silencio por respuesta. Quienquiera que sea este misterioso heredero, no se da a conocer.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A minute passes, then another. The guests fidget nervously. But your words are met with nothing but silence — the mysterious heir still hasn't revealed themselves.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasa un minuto. Después otro. Los asistentes juguetean, nerviosos. Sin embargo, tus palabras solo reciben el silencio por respuesta. Quienquiera que sea este misterioso heredero, no se da a conocer.{/n}

languages.text: {n}1分、また1分と過ぎてゆく。参列者たちは不安そうにそわそわしている。しかし、返ってくるのは沈黙だけ…謎の相続人はいまだに姿を現さない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A minute passes, then another. The guests fidget nervously. But your words are met with nothing but silence — the mysterious heir still hasn't revealed themselves.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}1分、また1分と過ぎてゆく。参列者たちは不安そうにそわそわしている。しかし、返ってくるのは沈黙だけ…謎の相続人はいまだに姿を現さない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Eine Minute vergeht, dann noch eine. Die Gäste sind unruhig und nervös. Aber auf deine Worte folgt nur Stille – der geheimnisvolle Erbe meldet sich nicht.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A minute passes, then another. The guests fidget nervously. But your words are met with nothing but silence — the mysterious heir still hasn't revealed themselves.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Eine Minute vergeht, dann noch eine. Die Gäste sind unruhig und nervös. Aber auf deine Worte folgt nur Stille – der geheimnisvolle Erbe meldet sich nicht.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Une minute s'écoule, puis une autre. Les invités s'agitent nerveusement, mais seul le silence vous répond. Le mystérieux héritier ne s'est toujours pas manifesté.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A minute passes, then another. The guests fidget nervously. But your words are met with nothing but silence — the mysterious heir still hasn't revealed themselves.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Une minute s'écoule, puis une autre. Les invités s'agitent nerveusement, mais seul le silence vous répond. Le mystérieux héritier ne s'est toujours pas manifesté.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bir dakika geçiyor, bir dakika daha geçiyor. Misafirler gergince kıpırdanıyor. Fakat sözlerin, sessizlikten başka bir cevap duymuyor. Gizemli vâris kendini göstermiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A minute passes, then another. The guests fidget nervously. But your words are met with nothing but silence — the mysterious heir still hasn't revealed themselves.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Bir dakika geçiyor, bir dakika daha geçiyor. Misafirler gergin bir şekilde kıpırdanıyor. Fakat sözlerin sessizlikten başka bir cevap alamıyor. Gizemli vâris kendini göstermiyor.{/n}
